title: ETtech Explainer: Timeline of CCI's antitrust probe into Amazon and Flipkart
description: In the antitrust case against Amazon and Flipkart, the Competition Commission of India (CCI) has sought the financial statements of the two ecommerce players to help determine the penalty. How did the four-year-long case begin, and whatâ€™s next? ETtech explains.
content: Ecommerce majors Flipkart and Amazon are in the throes of an antitrust investigation by the Competition Commission of India (CCI), for favouring select sellers on their platforms. The case, which began four years ago, comes ahead of the festive season which is most lucrative for these companies.
